mapper.select: SELECT app_info.id as AppinfoId,softwareName as appName,versionNo,publishStatus,versionSize, valueName as publishStatusName,downloadLink,apkFileName,app_version.modifyDate as modifyDate FROM app_version INNER JOIN app_info ON app_info.id = app_version.appId INNER JOIN data_dictionary ON app_version.publishStatus = data_dictionary.valueId WHERE typeName='发布状态' and app_info.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app_version (appId,versionNo, versionInfo, publishStatus, versionSize, createdBy , creationDate, apkLocPath ) VALUES (#{appId},#{versionNo},#{versionInfo},#{publishStatus},#{versionSize}, #{createdBy},#{creationDate},#{apkLocPath})
